minions.name: Felicia Day
minions.description: Move all minions to this base

minions.name: Wil Wheaton
minions.description: Special: You may play this minion when an opponent plays an action. Discard that action; it has no effect

minions.name: Game Guru
minions.description: Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' abilities

minions.name: Fan
minions.description: Special: On your turn, you may discard this card from your hand to draw a card

actions.name: Banned List
actions.description: For each other player, name a card and look at the player's hand. They must place any copies of that card from their hand on the bottom of their deck

actions.name: Rules Lawyer
actions.description: Transfer an action played on a base to another base, or transfer an action played on a minion to another minion

actions.name: Control Minion
actions.description: Choose a minion. You control that minion until the end of the turn. Special: Play when another player plays a minion. You gain control of that minion until the end of the turn

actions.name: Cosplay
actions.description: Special: Play when you gain 1 or more VP. Gain an additional 1 VP

actions.name: Force of Wil
actions.description: Special: Play when an opponent plays an action. Discard that action; it has no effect

actions.name: Griefer
actions.description: Choose one effect for each other player: That player discards a random card, or destroys one of his or her minions, or shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck

actions.name: Min-Maxing
actions.description: Look at an opponent's hand. You may play an action from that opponent's hand as an extra action

actions.name: Mulligan
actions.description: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may draw them and shuffle the rest of your hand into your deck

actions.name: Non-Infinite Loop
actions.description: Choose an action in your hand. Play it as an extra action, then you may put it back into your hand instead of the discard pile
